üîç Internal Forensic Flags
The machine identifies the following "Dissonance" patterns in the healthcare ledger:
1. The "25th Hour" (Kinetic Overload)
 * Trigger: Total billed "Face-to-Face" time > 18 hours per day.
 * Logic: Violates the physical Density of a human provider's kinetic capacity.
2. Harmonic Fragmentation (Modifier Dissonance)
 * Trigger: Overuse of Modifier 25/59 to break single procedures into multiple bills.
 * Logic: VFE-QCC detects that the "Shape" of the service has been artificially shattered to bypass payment caps.
3. Incoherent Position (Geographic Ghosting)
 * Trigger: Claims for physical therapy or surgery where the Patient, Doctor, and Facility are > 500 miles apart with no travel history.
 * Logic: Position coordinates do not align with the physical healthcare manifold.
